text: No, <@UJAPS2K4N> I'm selecting the font in the theme settings by assigning it to an h6.  When I do that the font is available to be used for other h-tags/p-tags or whatever.  If I don't assign it to the h6, it's not available.  How is HubSpot setting this up?  I don't want to have to assign it to anything in order to use the font.  And I don't think I need to import the font if HubSpot somehow knows it when I assign it to the h6.  I hope this makes sense :slightly_smiling_face:   Thank you!
Hey <@U038Z8HV44U>, you might like trying to post this in <#CF540P856|seo>
